definitions.title: prep.
definitions.body: in front of, before, because of; sq. [[דִּי]] as

definitions.title: conj.
definitions.body: because that (perh. in form a dimin., Bev:Da 2:8; Targum [[קְבֵיל]], c. [[לְ]], [[לִקְבֵיל]], sf. [[לְקִבֵלִי]], etc., in front of (Dalm.:§ 47, 7); Syr. qbuwl, quwblo0 aspect, men qbuwl in front, lquwbal, sf. lquwbleh in front (of), opposite (to), cf. Ge 15:10 Targum SyrVer; Palm. [[לקבל]] before (Cooke:321, cf.193));—cstr. [[לָקֳבֵל]] Da 2:8 +, sf. [[לְקָבְלָךְ]] † Da 2:31;—†

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: Da 3:3 [[חַלְמָא]] ´[[לק]]: before the image, Da 2:31, Da 5:1, Da 5:5; in view of, by reason of, Da 5:10 [[מַלְכָּא]] ´[[מִלֵּ]] :´[[לק]]: by reason of the words, etc., Ezr 4:16 [[לָקֳבֵל דְּנׇה]] (cf. Eg. Aram. [[לקבל זנה זי]], RES:361 B5).

c. [[כּׂל]], [[כָּל־קֳבֵל]] in view of, because of (but read probably [[כְּלָקֳבֵל]] according to the front of, i.e. having regard to, because of : Luzz:Chald. Gr. § 123 Lambert:RÉJ, 1895, 47 f. Marti:§ 95 d Nö:LCB, 1896, 703 Nes:OLZ, 1902, 487 Strack:56 al.; cf. BH I. [[עֻמָּה]]

definitions.title: prep.
definitions.body: [[כָּל־קֳבֵל דְּנׇה]] because of this, therefore, † Da 2:12, Da 2:24, Da 3:7, Da 3:8, Da 6:10, Ezr 7:17, Da 3:22 pointing forwards, ´[[כָּל־קֳבֵל דִּנׇה דִּנׇה מִן־דִּי וג]]: on this account, (viz.) because that, etc.

definitions.title: conj.
definitions.body: because that, inasmuch as, Da 2:8 [[דִּי חֲזֵיתוּן]] ([[כְּלָקֳבֵל]])[[כָּל־קֳבֵל ]] because ye see, v:Da 2:10, v:Da 2:41, v:Da 2:45 +, Ezr 4:14, Ezr 7:14; Da 5:22 = although. In Da 2:40, Da 6:11 taken by LXX (o(/n tro/pon, kaqw/v), Ges (Thes, not Lex), Ew Hi as = according as (as Ec 5:15 Targum [[כל קבל דאתא]] according as he came), but not Bev Behrm Marti. [Occas. in Targum, usu. = before; cf. in Targum:J Ge 28:17, Ge 31:32, D:§§ 47.7; 50].
